casebody.data:
Argued June 21, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. RONALD RAY RODACKER, Appellant. (No. C-55740) 497 P2d 1217 Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause and filed the brief for appellant. Thomas H. Denney, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem.

affirmed June 21, 1972

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Langtry and Foley, Judges.
